title: play with a friend from a different region
body: so.. i have a friend in finland and we wanted to play a game but it seemed that she couldnt add me at all and i couldnt add her either.. i know that we are from different regions but i really wanted to know if there was a way for me to play with her.. and if its impossible than please do something about it.. i dont expect everyone i want to play with to be in eu west.. every other game seems to do it..

replies.body: Where you play physically shouldn't impact your ability to play with someone else, as long as you are connecting to the same region.  If you are playing on our EUW server then your friend will need to be on that region as well to add and play with you.  Your friend can use the [League Signup](https://signup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/) page and select the server you're on to make an account and play with you.  I hope that helps!
